title: Tic-Tac-Toe X v. O
description: In a conflict as old as pencil and paper, two mighty armies square off in a battle between cross and circle. Two lovers, Rome-O and Juli-X, are caught in the middle.
quote: Remember my son, the one who controls the center controls the board.
alt1: in space, two giant ships shaped like an X and an O release smaller X and O ships
alt2: Rome-O looks helpless while talking with the wizard
alt3: Rome-O embraces with his lover Juli-X
alt4: the X spaceship lands on Rome-O and Juli-X screams
